description: Farmers and activists protested Bt brinjal release; government imposed moratorium.
Kenyan government banned GMO food imports citing health concerns; ban lifted in 2022 after food security crisis.
Zambia rejected GMO maize food aid during famine, citing biosafety concerns.
French government banned MON810 maize; Monsanto sued but courts upheld ban.
Supreme Court temporarily halted Bt eggplant trials due to biosafety concerns, later overturned.
